about_the_game:
Continuation of the first part.

2025, between the powers began the race for space exploration. A large number of rockets were sent into space to build several large space stations. The main goal was to study the microorganisms of asteroids, a frozen organism was discovered on one of the asteroids, as it seemed at first harmless.
After some time, it began to evolve and it needs a carrier, a person approached this role not badly! 90% of the stations were infected with an unknown virus, the evolution process has begun, in a short time there is little left of people.

You assume the role of the propagandist Nikolai, who is the commander of the special forces, in the Alpha squad.


Features:
• Modern graphics - realistic layout in sci-fi styles.
• More than 10 types of weapons.
• The bosses.
• Realistic visual effects - photorealistic visual effects.
• A large number of enemies - engage in a tough battle with enemies, explore the dark scary corridors.
• Excellent lighting - properly selected lighting creates an atmosphere of horror.
• The effect of time dilation.
• Dynamism.
• High-quality sounds - well-chosen and high-quality audio signals, as well as a soundtrack that fills the atmosphere of the game.
• High-quality shaders.

content_descriptors.notes: Attention! It is strongly not recommended for viewing to persons under the age of 18, as well as to people with a weak psyche. The game has scenes of violence and blood.
